function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Uncertainty in quantification of resilience","Impact":"Inaccurate measurement of resilience, leading to ineffective planning and response to contagious disease outbreaks.","Mitigation":"Use of probabilistic models and scenario analysis to account for uncertainty in resilience quantification.","Technologies":"Probabilistic modeling software, scenario analysis tools.","People":"Resilience researchers, public health officials, emergency responders.","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies, public health organizations."},{"Description":"Failure to consider extra penalty for performance loss and recovery time exceeding maximum acceptable values.","Impact":"Underestimation of resilience, leading to inadequate preparedness for the impact of contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Inclusion of penalties for performance loss and recovery time exceeding thresholds in resilience metrics and planning.","Technologies":"Resilience modeling software with penalty functions, decision support systems for resilience planning.","People":"Resilience researchers, policy makers, public health officials.","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies, public health organizations."},{"Description":"Incorporation of multiple hazards into the resilience measurement approach.","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of resilience to contagious diseases when multiple hazards are involved, leading to ineffective response strategies.","Mitigation":"Development of a comprehensive multi-hazard resilience framework that accounts for interactions between different hazards and their impact on contagious disease propagation.","Technologies":"Multi-hazard modeling and simulation software, network analysis tools for hazard interaction assessment.","People":"Resilience researchers, emergency planners, public health officials.","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies, public health organizations."}]}
